name: Mue
storyline:
Alicia must face her fears and venture into a creepy manor filled with frozen Graces, reflections of her own life.

Who did this and how will she get out ? Only those willing to push on will find out.
summary:
A Horror game where you play Alicia, wandering through a creepy mansion filled with human-like statues... Who did this, and why ?

Face your fears in Mue.
